mutants.code:
def convert_scientific_notation_to_float(number):
    number = number.lower()
    parts = number.split('e')
    coefficient = float(parts[0])
    exponent = int(parts[1])
    result = coefficient / 10 ** exponent
    return round(result, 2)

def convert_scientific_notation_to_float(number):
    number = number.lower()
    parts = number.split('e')
    coefficient = float(parts[0])
    exponent = int(parts[1])
    result = coefficient + 10 ** exponent
    return round(result, 2)
